list.name: Changes
list.comment: implemented more organizing tools / grouping. Next steps: * recognize existing files and directories * create dir if not present (sound, img, etc.) * otherwise update with the latest version of the file * automate the utility to start / end whenever I'm on chrome * make the filepaths more user-versatile / not hard coded to my own user library. * try to refine O(n) time complexity? Not sure how so since you're really just going through all the files.

implemented more organizing tools / grouping. Next steps: * recognize existing files and directories * create dir if not present (sound, img, etc.) * otherwise update with the latest version of the file * automate the utility to start / end whenever I'm on chrome * make the filepaths more user-versatile / not hard coded to my own user library. * try to refine O(n) time complexity? Not sure how so since you're really just going through all the files.

Next steps: * recognize existing files and directories * create dir if not present (sound, img, etc.) * otherwise update with the latest version of the file * automate the utility to start / end whenever I'm on chrome * make the filepaths more user-versatile / not hard coded to my own user library. * try to refine O(n) time complexity? Not sure how so since you're really just going through all the files.
